body_html:
OK, would be cool to change those variable assignments to not be inplace, but that's for another PR :)

Also, we need to setup mypy on CI so the annotations don't regress. Probably easiest to do this on Travis?

body:
OK, would be cool to change those variable assignments to not be inplace, but that's for another PR :)

Also, we need to setup mypy on CI so the annotations don't regress. Probably easiest to do this on Travis?
